name: Angry Gorilla
description:
You are a gorilla.

You have to protect the forest from the humans, they will try to harm you.

Your score in this game is determined by how many people you kill and how much drumming you do.

Try to drumming as much as you can.

Controls

  • Z key Jump
  • X key Drumming
  • C key Poop Bomb
  • Q key Retry
  • ESC key Config
